name: Fate Card Art Generation
description: Generate Fate Card illustrations for Death, Body, and Seed cards with consistent styling

card_type.description: Type of Fate Card to generate

visual_prompt.description: Visual description for the card art

color_scheme.description: Primary color scheme for seed cards

base_prompt_components.style: masterwork tarot card illustration, ornate gilded frame, painterly style, dramatic lighting, Yuto Sano inspired, Romance of Three Kingdoms aesthetic, wuxia fantasy
base_prompt_components.quality: masterpiece, best quality, highly detailed, intricate details, 8k resolution
base_prompt_components.negative: nsfw, nude, text, watermark, signature, blurry, low quality, amateur, bad anatomy, ugly, deformed, disfigured, extra limbs, mutated

death.theme: mortality and endings, ethereal, spectral, ghostly presence, skull motifs, spirit realm, afterlife imagery
death.colors: grayscale with silver accents, pale blue highlights, misty atmosphere, moonlight
death.border_style: bone and skull ornaments, withered flowers, hourglasses, candle flames

body.theme: physical prowess, martial arts, combat stances, muscular definition, movement and power
body.colors: warm earth tones, bronze and copper accents, dynamic red highlights
body.border_style: weapon motifs, armor plates, chain links, martial symbols

seed.theme: elemental essence, cultivation energy, flowing qi, cosmic connection, inner power
seed.colors: determined by seed color - azure/blue, crimson/red, jade/green, obsidian/black
seed.border_style: flowing energy patterns, yin-yang symbols, elemental icons, lotus flowers

silent_river.visual: a serene figure standing in a calm river at twilight, mist rising from water, willow trees, peaceful acceptance of fate, flowing robes dissolving into water

burning_phoenix.visual: a figure engulfed in transformative flames rising from ashes, phoenix wings emerging from fire, rebirth imagery, defiant expression

void_mirror.visual: a figure gazing into a cracked mirror showing the void beyond, reality distortion, transcendent clarity, seeing through illusions

eternal_watcher.visual: an ancient sentinel standing vigil atop weathered stone, unblinking eyes watching the ages pass, patient and enduring

stone_anchor.visual: a rooted warrior in immovable stance, feet merged with stone ground, mountain behind, unshakable defense posture

lightning_step.visual: a blur of motion capturing multiple positions at once, lightning crackling around feet, speed lines, after-images

iron_mountain.visual: a massive armored figure with skin like iron, taking blows unflinching, mountain silhouette in form, indomitable

serpent_coil.visual: a flexible fighter in serpentine pose, coiling around attacks, striking from unexpected angles, sinuous movement

crane_stance.visual: an elegant martial artist balanced on one leg, crane wings suggested in pose, graceful and deadly, perfect balance

azure_flow.visual: a figure in meditation as water flows through and around them, mental clarity shown as crystalline streams, blue energy

crimson_fury.visual: a passionate warrior channeling rage into flames, crimson fire erupting from intense emotion, powerful but dangerous

jade_serenity.visual: a harmonized figure in perfect balance, jade energy connecting body and spirit, peaceful power, lotus position

silver_lightning.visual: electric thoughts visualized as silver lightning, quick mind, precision strikes, mental speed manifest

obsidian_void.visual: a mysterious figure drawing power from darkness, void energy swirling, shadow and substance, hidden depths

prompt_template: {style}, {quality}, {card_type_theme}, {specific_visual}, {card_type_colors}, tarot card format, centered composition, ornate {border_style}, {rarity_modifier}

rarity_modifiers.rare: intricate golden details, glowing elements, magical aura
rarity_modifiers.legendary: transcendent radiance, divine light, legendary artifact quality, ethereal glow, masterwork craftsmanship
